body.raw:
{
  "name": "user-profile",
  "label": "User Profile Schema",
  "description": "Schema for user profile data with validation rules",
  "plugin": "core",
  "properties": [
    {
      "type": "string",
      "name": "firstName",
      "displayName": "First Name",
      "description": "User's first name",
      "required": true,
      "unique": false,
      "default": "",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 50,
      "minLength": 1,
      "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z\\s]+$"
    },
    {
      "type": "string",
      "name": "email",
      "displayName": "Email Address",
      "description": "User's email address",
      "required": true,
      "unique": true,
      "default": "",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 255,
      "minLength": 5,
      "pattern": "^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+\\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$"
    },
    {
      "type": "number",
      "name": "age",
      "displayName": "Age",
      "description": "User's age in years",
      "required": false,
      "unique": false,
      "default": "0",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 0,
      "minLength": 0,
      "pattern": ""
    }
  ]
}

{
  "persistenceId": 1,
  "name": "user-profile",
  "label": "Updated User Profile Schema",
  "description": "Updated schema for user profile data with enhanced validation rules",
  "plugin": "core",
  "properties": [
    {
      "type": "string",
      "name": "firstName",
      "displayName": "First Name",
      "description": "User's first name",
      "required": true,
      "unique": false,
      "default": "",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 50,
      "minLength": 1,
      "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z\\s]+$"
    },
    {
      "type": "string",
      "name": "lastName",
      "displayName": "Last Name",
      "description": "User's last name",
      "required": true,
      "unique": false,
      "default": "",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 50,
      "minLength": 1,
      "pattern": "^[a-zA-Z\\s]+$"
    },
    {
      "type": "string",
      "name": "email",
      "displayName": "Email Address",
      "description": "User's email address",
      "required": true,
      "unique": true,
      "default": "",
      "length": 0,
      "maxLength": 255,
      "minLength": 5,
      "pattern": "^[\\w\\.-]+@[\\w\\.-]+\\.[a-zA-Z]{2,}$"
    }
  ]
}
